title: The Desperate Attempt to Link Pelosi Attacker to GOP | Guests: Michael Shellenberger & John Ziegler | 10/31/22
description:
An intruder brutally attacked Nancy Pelosi's husband, Paul, at his home, and the media quickly tried to paint the perpetrator as a MAGA extremist and link the attack to the GOP at large. Glenn goes through the facts and lays out the inconsistencies of the story being fed to us. Pat Gray joins the guys to go over Paul Pelosi's attacker, his possible ideological leanings, and the media's manipulation of the story. Author of "San Fransicko" Michael Shellenberger dives deep into the attack on Paul Pelosi and the dangers of nationalizing oil and gas. "The Death Of Journalism" co-host John Ziegler joins to give his unique take on Paul Pelosi's attacker and the journalistic standards he uses. Glenn and Stu review the absurd responses to Kanye West's controversial statements.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
